title: Chocolate caramel cheesecake
ingredients: ['170g digestive biscuit crumbs', '5 tablespoons sugar', '125g butter, melted', '30 individually wrapped chewy toffees, unwrapped', '45ml milk', '90g chopped pecans', '170g chocolate chips', '3 (200g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '150g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs']
